newsitem.title: GERMANY: Alitalia launches Germany Internet service.
newsitem.headline: Alitalia launches Germany Internet service.

text.p: Alitalia said it has launched a German-language Internet home page for the German air cargo market.
Alitalia cargo manager Germany, Dirk Steiger, told Reuters in an interview the site would provide forwarders and customers with information on the airline's cargo services.
He added: "We are trying to build a link to our tracking and tracing system, flight schedule, aircraft capacity and other information."
The Alitalia Germany home page address is http://members.aol.azcargo/html. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+44 171 542 5017
